village.name: Hariyali Gram Panchayat
village.description: A progressive village known for its sustainable farming practices, rich cultural heritage, and strong community participation in development activities.
village.vision: To become a model village demonstrating sustainable development, digital empowerment, and inclusive growth.

sarpanch.name: Mrs. Sunita Sharma
sarpanch.message: Together we build a stronger, more prosperous village for our future generations.

announcements.title: Gram Sabha Meeting - November 2024
announcements.content: Monthly Gram Sabha meeting scheduled for November 15th, 2024 at 10:00 AM in the Community Hall. All villagers are requested to attend.

announcements.title: New Water Supply Project Approved
announcements.content: ₹50 lakhs approved for new water supply infrastructure. Work to begin from December 2024.

announcements.title: Digital India Initiative
announcements.content: Free computer training program for youth aged 18-35. Registration open at Panchayat Office.

schemes.name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
schemes.description: Direct income support of ₹6000 per year to farmer families
schemes.application: Online at pmkisan.gov.in or Panchayat Office

schemes.name: Ayushman Bharat
schemes.description: Health insurance scheme providing coverage up to ₹5 lakhs per family per year

schemes.name: MGNREGA
schemes.description: Guaranteed 100 days of employment per rural household per year
schemes.eligibility: Rural households willing to do manual work

developmentWorks.title: Village Road Construction
developmentWorks.description: Construction of 5 km concrete roads connecting main village to agricultural areas

developmentWorks.title: Community Health Center
developmentWorks.description: New primary health center with modern medical facilities and ambulance service

developmentWorks.title: Solar Street Lighting
developmentWorks.description: Installation of 150 solar LED street lights across all village roads

developmentWorks.title: Digital Library
developmentWorks.description: Modern library with computer lab and internet facility for students

office.address: Gram Panchayat Office, Hariyali Village, Taluka Haveli, District Pune, Maharashtra - 411001
office.hours: Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Saturday: 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM

documents.name: Birth Certificate Application
documents.description: Application form for birth certificate registration

documents.name: Death Certificate Application
documents.description: Application form for death certificate registration

documents.name: Gram Sabha Resolution 2024
documents.description: Annual resolutions passed in Gram Sabha meetings
